actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: Resolution disapproving the proposed obligation of the United States with respect to certain shipbuilding contracts.

summary.text: Disapproves the proposed obligation of the United States with respect to specified shipbuilding contracts including contracts with the Electric Boat Division, General Dynamics Corporation; Ingalls Shipbuilding Division, Litton Systems, Inc.; Newport New Shipbuilding and Dry Dock Company; and the National Steel and Shipbuilding Company.

titles.title: Resolution disapproving the proposed obligation of the United States with respect to certain shipbuilding contracts.
